export var UPDATE_INTERVAL_LIST="UPDATE_INTERVAL_LIST";export var UPDATE_NOTE_LIST="UPDATE_NOTE_LIST";export var TOGGLE_CONTROLS="TOGGLE_CONTROLS";export var UPDATE_PROBABILITY="UPDATE_PROBABILITY";export var UPDATE_TIME="UPDATE_TIME";export var SAVE_PREVIOUS_PROBABILITY="SAVE_PREVIOUS_PROBABILITY";export var UPDATE_STATS="UPDATE_STATS";export var START_TIME="START_TIME";export var UPDATE_FLASHCARD_SHOWN_TIME="UPDATE_FLASHCARD_SHOWN_TIME";export var ANSWER_RECEIVED="ANSWER_RECEIVED";export function answerReceived(time){return{type:ANSWER_RECEIVED,payload:time};}export function startTime(time){return{type:START_TIME,payload:time};}export function toggleControls(){return{type:TOGGLE_CONTROLS};}export function updateStats(time){var numResponses=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:1;console.log("here: ",{time:time,numResponses:numResponses});return{type:UPDATE_STATS,payload:{time:time,numResponses:numResponses}};}export function updateTime(time){return{type:UPDATE_TIME,payload:time};}export function updateFlashcardShownTime(time){return{type:UPDATE_FLASHCARD_SHOWN_TIME,payload:time};}export function updateProbability(note,interval,probability){return{type:UPDATE_PROBABILITY,payload:{note:note,interval:interval,probability:probability}};}//take the probability
export function savePreviousProbability(note,interval,probability){return{type:SAVE_PREVIOUS_PROBABILITY,payload:{note:note,interval:interval,probability:probability}};}
